sentences.sContent: Each sculptural planter is made-to-order with handmade glass and lead-free solder and comes with everything you need but the plants.
sentences.sContent_eng: Each sculptural planter is made-to-order with handmade glass and lead-free solder and comes with everything you need but the plants.
sentences.sCn: 每个艺术花盆都是定制的。 它们由手工制作的玻璃和无铅焊料接合而成，交付使用时，万事俱备，只欠花卉。

sentences.sContent: This superior reliability comes from advances in packaging techniques and epitaxial structure, together with the use of hard solder construction.
sentences.sContent_eng: This superior reliability comes from advances in packaging techniques and epitaxial structure, together with the use of hard solder construction.
sentences.sCn: 这种超级可靠性来自于封装技术和外延结构的发展，也得益于硬焊接架构的使用。

sentences.sContent: You can either solder them together properly with a metal strip on the front, or just try positioning the metal correctly inside the case with the cells.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can either solder them together properly with a metal strip on the front, or just try positioning the metal correctly inside the case with the cells.
sentences.sCn: 你可以使用前面的金属条将他们焊在一起，或者只是定位好电池盒里面的电池单元的金属条。

phrases.pCn: 焊锡；锡焊条，锡焊料；软焊料

remMethod.val: 我们的战士(soldier)是钢铁焊接(solder)而成的

words.tran: 焊接；使联合；修补（solder的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: a soft metal, usually a mixture of  lead  and  tin  , which can be melted and used to join two metal surfaces, wires etc
to join or repair metal surfaces with solder
